Class DatabaseHasher

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a password hasher for the database.

      • getHashedPassword

        public java.lang.String getHashedPassword(java.lang.String plainTextPassword,
                                          int iterations,
                                          int keyLength)
        Parameters:
        plainTextPassword - the password in plain text to be hashed.
        iterations - the amount of the iterations for the algorithm.
        keyLength - the output length of the hash.
        Returns:
        the hashed password.

      • getHashedPassword

        public java.lang.String getHashedPassword(java.lang.String plainTextPassword,
                                          int iterations)
        Parameters:
        plainTextPassword - the password in plain text to be hashed.
        iterations - the amount of the iterations for the algorithm.
        Returns:
        the hashed password, with a default key length of 512 and the given iterations.

      • getHashedPassword

        public java.lang.String getHashedPassword(java.lang.String plainTextPassword)
        Parameters:
        plainTextPassword - the password in plain text to be hashed.
        Returns:
        the hashed password, with a default key length of 512 and 1000 iterations.

      • initializeHashedDatabase

        public java.util.List<Unicorn> initializeHashedDatabase(java.util.List<Unicorn> unicorns,
                                                        int iterations,
                                                        int keyLength)
        Parameters:
        unicorns - the list of unicorns with plain text password to be hashed.
        iterations - the amount of the iterations for the algorithm.
        keyLength - the output length of the hash.
        Returns:
        the database with hashed passwords.
